attributes.action: Pass an act of parliament and or to instill greater emphasis in our schools and colleges of the fine and proud history of our manufacturing. With the need for greener energy and technology there is a wonderful opportunity for us to come to the forefront of green research, wvhch is being done at present very heavily in France and Germany. This could create decent jobs and wealth in our communities. I also favour bringing 'clean coal' technology to the fore, and rebuilding our mining industry to reduce our dependence on increasingly expensive oil and potentially unreliable gas imports. I also favour recreating a British owned and run motor manufacturing industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that this will give us a new chance to regenerate and re-invigorate our country.

Giving our youth new rays of hope, and the chance to restore stability to our nation.

This will create inroads to regenerating and replacing, our lost native industries.
